articles.title: Coronavirus: What's happening in Canada and around the world on Thursday - CBC.ca
articles.description: Some wealthy nations that were most praised last year for controlling the coronavirus are now lagging far behind in getting their people vaccinated — and some, especially in Asia, are seeing COVID-19 cases grow.

articles.title: 99 of 100 cities most at risk environmentally in Asia - CNA
articles.description: Of the 100 cities worldwide most vulnerable to environmental hazards all but one are in Asia, and four-fifths are in India or China, according to a risk assessment published Friday.
articles.content: PARIS: Of the 100 cities worldwide most vulnerable to environmental hazards all but one are in Asia, and four-fifths are in India or China, according to a risk assessment published on Friday (May 13)… [+3794 chars]

articles.title: Amid growing criticism from West, China secures ties in Central Asia - South China Morning Post

articles.title: Australian woman wakes from surgery with an Irish accent - The Irish Times
articles.description: An Australian Asian woman who woke up from surgery on her tonsils, speaking in what seems to be an Irish accent, has been documenting her experience on TikTok.
